meanings.definition: The first stomach of a ruminant animal, which receives food from the esophagus and partly digests it before passing it to the reticulum.
meanings.sent1: The rumens of a cow help in breaking down the food.
meanings.sent2: The farmer observed the rumens of the sheep during feeding time.
meanings.sent3: The rumens of the goat seemed to be having a party with all the food they were digesting.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts churned in her mind like the rumens of a cow digesting food.
meanings.sent5: The rumens of the deer were like a magical chamber where food transformed into energy.
